headline: Philip Morris (PM): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q3 Earnings?
summary: Philip Morris has followed the market’s trajectory closely, rising in tandem with the S&P 500 over the past six months. The stock has climbed by 9.2% to $172.32 per share while the index has gained 8.2%.
